title: Charged twice for same subscription
description: I was charged $299 twice on the same day for my annual subscription. I only authorized one payment. This is causing issues with my company card and I need this resolved immediately.

title: Service has been down for 3 hours
description: Our entire team cannot access the platform since 2pm. We have a major client presentation at 5pm and need this resolved ASAP. This is completely unacceptable for an enterprise customer.

title: Request full refund - not satisfied
description: After using your product for 2 months, I'm not satisfied with the ROI. The features promised in the sales demo aren't working as expected. I want a full refund for the annual plan I purchased.

title: Cancelling subscription - moving to competitor
description: We've decided to move to CompetitorX. Please cancel our subscription effective immediately. We're not happy with the recent price increase and lack of new features.

title: Need custom SSO integration for enterprise rollout
description: We're planning to deploy your platform across 500 users next quarter. We need SAML SSO integration which isn't in your standard plan. Can this be added as a custom feature?

title: GDPR data deletion request
description: As per GDPR Article 17, I request complete deletion of all my personal data from your systems within 30 days. Please confirm receipt and provide documentation of deletion.

title: Partial credit for service interruption last week
description: We experienced 6 hours of downtime last Tuesday which impacted our operations. While I appreciate the quick resolution, I believe we deserve partial credit given our SLA guarantees 99.9% uptime.

title: URGENT: Need to speak with CEO immediately
description: I've been trying to resolve a billing issue for 3 weeks through support with no resolution. This is unacceptable. I need to escalate this to the CEO or someone who can actually make decisions.

title: How do I export my data?
description: I'm trying to export all my customer data to CSV but can't find the export button in the dashboard. Can you point me to the right place or documentation?

title: Need to modify contract terms for expansion
description: We want to expand from 50 to 200 users but need to adjust our contract pricing. Our current agreement locks us into per-user pricing that doesn't make sense at this scale. Can we negotiate new terms?
